title: Determining Wavelength-Dependent Quantum Yields of Photodegradation: Importance of Experimental Setup and Reference Values for Actinometers
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00084F, Paper
Luana de Brito Anton, Andrea Silverman, Jennifer N. Apell
Accurate quantum yields are crucial for modeling photochemical reactions in natural and engineered treatment systems. Quantum yields are usually determined using a single representative light source such as xenon lamps...
